author: Susie Madrak
title: Inside Corporate America's Campaign To Ditch Workers Comp
text:
Nounverb911 • 1 min ago 
"We are paying people not to work." And that seems to include you, Rush. Have you produced anything in your entire life besides hot air? posted on Rush Limbaugh Longs For The Days Of 'Depression Era' Suffering SFnomad • 1 min ago 
I get tired of hearing this "94 million" number. No matter how many times you try to explain it to them they don't seem to get that of those 94 million 
43 million of them are 65+ and retired13 million of them are in higher education (college)2 million are incarceratedmillions are stay at home moms and dadsmillions are 16 and older and still in grade school posted on Rush Limbaugh Longs For The Days Of 'Depression Era' Suffering Latest from CLTV
